question:
[Sara] and her Grandfather [Tommy] enjoyed feeding the ducks at the park [Mickey] asked his brother, [Leandro], if he wanted to go to the beach. [Leandro] said he could n't go because he had to take [Naomi], his sister, to see the dentist. [Tommy] took his daughter, [Judy], to a baseball game. [Mickey] took his sister [Naomi] too the zoo but his sister [Sara] could n't come because she had to work. [Elizabeth] was mad at her son, [Mickey]. She found he'd been stealing from her purse.
Question: How is [Judy] related to [Elizabeth]?
